sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: CAUTION: be sure to follow the Accessibility guidelines when adding a background image. Text over images must have enough contrast to pass WCAG AA standards (preferably WCAG AAA). See the style guide for more details.

sub_fields.label: Action hook slug
sub_fields.name: action_hook_slug
sub_fields.instructions: For developers: a Wordpress action hook with the slug name entered will be inserted into this spot in the page layout. Use add_action in your child theme to inject content into this spot.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: **Only create one Image Carousel per page. If more than one carousel is created they will not work properly. However, you can create a Hero Carousel and Image Carousel and they will both work.

sub_fields.instructions: Limited to 25 characters

sub_fields.label: Content Panel
sub_fields.name: content_panel
sub_fields.instructions: Limited to 150 characters

sub_fields.label: Quote Text
sub_fields.name: quote_text
sub_fields.placeholder: “I shall never be content until the beneficent influence of the University reaches every home in the state.”

sub_fields.placeholder: UW President Charles Van Hise in 1904
